description: Craving a burger? This healthier chicken burger recipe is bursting with flavour and perfect for a lazy summer BBQ. Try it today.
name: Healthier Chicken Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
500 g Macro free range chicken breast schnitzel
250 g Macro Organic coleslaw & kale slaw kit
320 g Macro lower carb linseed & sunflower seed bread rolls

recipeInstructions.text: Spread roll bases with chutney. Top with slaw, beetroot, chicken and cucumber. Sandwich with roll tops and serve.
